sentences.sentence: If you look at the componentry in any device you buy, it comes from literally all parts of the world.
sentences.translation: 如果在你买的任何设备里你看一下部件，它实际上是来自世界各个地区。

sentences.sentence: TopListener is an interface used to separate business - or environment-specific responsibilities from other TCF componentry.
sentences.translation: TopListener是一个接口，用来将特定于业务或环境的职责与其它TCF组件分隔开。

sentences.sentence: For example, the JTC interface is implemented by all the major TCF componentry. The JTC interface yields the following benefits.
sentences.translation: 例如，JTC接口是由所有主要的TCF组件实现的。
